description:
A personal injury can be devastating to one's health, finances, career and relationships. Kleem Law, LLC, a law firm located in Dalton, Georgia, works with injured people and their loved ones to recover adequate compensation from liable parties and capitalistic insurance companies. If you or a loved one lives with the consequences of serious harm, our team will put our knowledge of personal injury law and experience to work for you to fight for fair compensation.

Attorney Curtis Kleem has nearly two decades of experience in the area of personal injury law. During those two decades, our team has acquired the skill and know-how to adeptly handle cases ranging from the every day to the rare and complex. Our law firm has seamlessly guided clients toward successful verdicts for cases involving car and trucking accidents, motor vehicle defects, brain injury, birth injury, assault and battery, health care and insurance disputes, medical malpractice, injury by medical devices and drugs, nursing home abuse, sexual abuse, bad faith insurance and wrongful death.

Kleem Law, LLC, also focuses a large part of our practice on family law issues. We understand the delicate and often contentious nature of family legal matters and strive to help parties obtain the best possible outcome. Though we prefer to try to help parties resolve their differences through alternative dispute resolution, we are prepared to go to court to settle matters related to child custody, divorce, military divorce and adoption.

Curtis has earned the highest peer rating possible of AV Preeminent* from Martindale-Hubbell. Our law firm offers free initial consultations.
